Html:
I have a few questions about the Code promotion plan.

1) How do you maintain good code quality in this branching plan?

2) After a deployment is done from the production plan, is it best practice to delete the production branch or retire the branch ?

Another major challenge we face with our chosen branching plan is that we want one of the branches (maybe the production) to be a reflection of what is in our live environment. Is this possible with the code promotion plan?

3) Can concurrent QA testing occur for different deployments in the QA branch without having to create a new branch?

4) Is it worth creating a branching plan if we do not run any BVTs?
